articles.author: Justin Jouvenal
articles.title: Justice Barrett defends Supreme Court’s decision to overturn Roe - The Washington Post
articles.description: In her new memoir, the only woman on the court’s conservative majority writes the 1973 decision upholding a right to abortion was a historic outlier and went against the will of many Americans.
articles.content: Justice Amy Coney Barrett defends her vote that helped the Supreme Court overturn the right to abortion in 2022, writing in a new memoir that the idea that the Constitution guarantees such access is … [+37 chars]
